title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $60,000 but Analysts Warn of More Selling Ahead
shortdescription: Bitcoin recovered from its previous low on Friday, narrowly escaping a drop below the critical $60,000 level, but some market analysts predicted further selling ahead.
description: Bitcoin slips 50% from peak, briefly flirts with $60,000 as bear market deepens — analysts warn institutional outflows could drive further losses.
author: Emma Chen

title: White House Hosts Key Meeting to Resolve Crypto Market Legislation Stalemate
shortdescription: Banking and crypto leaders meet at White House to resolve stablecoin rewards dispute in the Clarity Act.
description: The White House is bringing together banking and crypto leaders to resolve issues over stablecoin rewards in the Clarity Act. This could shape the future of digital asset regulations in the U.S.
author: Emma Chen

title: Solana Breaks All-Time High at $264 – Overtakes BNB as Third Largest Cryptocurrency
shortdescription: SOL surges 800% in 2024 as meme coins, DeFi, and institutional adoption drive network activity to record levels.
description: Solana hits new ATH at $264 with 800% yearly gain — meme coins and DeFi push network to 5,000 TPS sustained.
author: Emma Chen
